game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai

review: underrated game  this game is really good actually with a different taste its not like the other campaigns in shogun 2 since you dont have the mechanichs of different units like gunpowder units but you win the campaign by bribing influencing and intrigue your main unit is the foot samurai so battles are different than the other campaigns  if you are interested in the genpei era i highly recommend it
game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai

review: this was a nice staple of the original and it was fun to play it again

review: this is one of the most under rated expansions for any total war had a blast with it  i played through every faction on my youtube channel httpswwwyoutubecombluepigeon3242featured
game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai

review: rise of the samurai focuses on an earlier japan an easier start to the game its a pretty fun campaing with new units new people new factions and new battles  a campaing set in an early date it gives you an easier start to the game if youre trying to learn how everything works new units new clans new single battle  pretty nice to travel back in time fight in an earlier period
game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai

review: this dlc offers a unique emphasis on politics challenging gameplay and a beautiful art style while it lacks new troops and has overpowered ai mods can enhance the experience it serves as a good introduction to the series and provides a different samuraiera setting the addition of cooperative campaign mode adds to the overall enjoyment

review: like this dlc very much its a enjoyable campaign whereby you can max out your empire and its not super stressful this campaign isnt for difficulty rather for enjoyment unique time period with unique units the clan allegiance system is very enjoyable   what needs to be improved is the unit variety now that its 2019 i doubt they will go back and fix this but differing units per each faction would be enormously helpful   710 would be 910 if the unit variety wasnt lacking

review: rise of the samurai is well worth the money you have to pay to get it  an expansion upon the original game it takes you back to japan during the middle ages  while not unique from the base game it does play and feel different from shogun 2 which makes it well worth a playthrough  a plethora of new units and agents keeps this campaign fresh and different enough to make it enjoyable
game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai

review: marvelous dlc  some great new gamemechanics overall well balanced interesting and well designed factions too  i enjoyed this campaign more than the main one  i like that there are no black powder units here some may see it as a downside but it really gives it that ancientmedieval feeling
game_title: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai
